label: financial_irregularity_02_ep_001
content:

### Auditor Notes
- Standard revenue accruals within policy

- No open items from prior quarter close

### Events

- Plant 3 maintenance shutdown scheduled for March, 5 days
- ERP migration Phase 1 go-live: AP module

### Notes
- January close: standard month-end procedures, all reconciliations complete within SLA.
